Text:
Nice upload billoncho. Thanks for them all.

Windows Users: Extract with 7-Zip, convert resulting .hfs file to ISO with MagicISO. Real good quality.
The file is in .dmg format. Converted it to ISO using PowerISO but seems to be corrupted after mounting to a virtual drive.
On the second thought, the file could just be unreadable by Windows 7 even after converting the file to ISO format. Anyone managed to run this on Windows 7?
Nice effort, next time try uploading in a standard format though. Mac, Windows and Linux users can all use ISO.
Why do you post .dmg files? Fail.
